will_review: Hvala ti! Pomno ćemo pregledati tvoj zahtjev i odgovoriti ti unutar jednog radnog dana.
ticket_incomplete: Oprez! Vaš zahtjev nije završen. Unesite sve tražene informacije i pokušajte poslati ponovno.
allow_to_serve_better: Da bi što bolje obradili zahtjev, molimo vas opišite što detaljnije o problemu. Što ste točno pokušali napraviti prije nego se problem pojavio? Gdje ste to pokušali? (U Xumm-u? Na vanjskoj web stranici?) Je li se pojavila poruka greške? Bi li snimak ekrana bolje objasnio problem?
please_describe: Molimo opišite vaše pitanje / problem / sugestiju / ... sa što više detalja moguće.
open_again: Zbog sigurnosnih razloga, sesije xApp XUMM Podrške traju kratko i povezane su na identitet mreže. Molimo ponovno otvorite xApp XUMM Podrške.
app_or_support_center: Please open XUMM Support with the xApp available in Xumm or submit a support ticket in the {{ support_center }}.
no_read_only: XUMM Support is not available for Read Only accounts.
switch_full_access: Please switch to a full access account by tapping the Switch account button in the upper right corner (at your XUMM account home screen).
no_full_access_mail: If you do not have access to a <q>Full Access</q> account, please mail {{ mailaddr }}
warning_version: Warning! You are running Xumm version {{ current_version }} while version {{ latest_version }} is already available. Please update Xumm to prevent questions about issues already addressed in the updated Xumm version(s).
trouble_finding_ticket: We apologize but we are having trouble displaying your support ticket. Sorry for the inconvenience... 🙏.
maintenance: Our support center is currently under maintenance. Please check back later.
agents_will_help: {{ agent_names }} will help you when they can.
waiting_for_agent: Waiting for a XUMM Support agent
with_you_in: We will be with you within one working day
oops_didnt_work: Oops, that didn't work. Please try again.
subject: Subject
any_last_comments: Any last comments or kind words?
